content: the fluffy cloud hat is a ribbed beanie with a folded brim it is knit in 1×1 rib the hat is knit in the round from the bottom up with two strands of yarn held together dk-weight merino wool and mohair the long-tail tubular cast-on is used for this hat this cast-on gives a rounded edge that is very stretchy and looks professional but you can also use the standard long-tail cast-on
